title: title
tajMahaldescription: The Taj Mahal, located in Agra, India, is one of the world’s most iconic monuments. Built by Emperor Shah Jahan in the 17th century in memory of his wife, Mumtaz Mahal, this white marble masterpiece combines Persian, Mughal, and Indian architectural styles.the Taj Mahal changes its mood with the light—glowing pink at dawn, blinding white at noon, and golden at sunset. Every inch of it tells a story of devotion, loss, and artistry, making it not only one of the Seven Wonders of the World, but a place where love truly echoes through time. With its breathtaking dome, intricate carvings, and symmetrical gardens, the Taj Mahal is a true architectural marvel. Recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage site and one of the New Seven Wonders of the World, it draws millions of visitors each year. Visit the Taj Mahal to witness the grandeur and hear the timeless love story that inspired its creation.
